report.title: Samples List for the NPMS Extra Species form.
report.description: Display a list of samples for the NPMS Extra Species page
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_samples_functional csf on csf.id = o.sample_id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf ON csnf.id = csf.id JOIN locations square_or_plot ON square_or_plot.id = csf.location_id AND square_or_plot.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations square ON square.id=square_or_plot.parent_id AND square.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavPlotName ON lavPlotName.location_attribute_id=#plot_number_attr_id# AND lavPlotName.location_id=square_or_plot.id AND square_or_plot.parent_id IS NULL AND lavPlotName.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms termPlotType ON termPlotType.id = square_or_plot.location_type_id AND square_or_plot.parent_id IS NULL JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id #agreements_join# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND csf.created_by_id=#iUserID# AND csf.survey_id = #survey_id# #order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for?

param.name: iUserID
param.description: Indicia User ID: use 0 to ignore

param.name: plot_number_attr_id
param.description: Id of the location attribute that holds the plot number label

column.name: location_name
column.sql: COALESCE( case when lavPlotName.text_value IS NULL and square.id IS NULL then '' || 'Plot at ' || square_or_plot.centroid_sref || ' ('|| termPlotType.term || ') ' || '' when lavPlotName.text_value IS NOT NULL and square.id IS NULL then '' || 'Plot ' || lavPlotName.text_value || ' at ' || square_or_plot.centroid_sref || ' ('|| termPlotType.term || ') ' || '' end , csf.location_name, csnf.public_entered_sref)
